ComicInfo.Title: A Dance to Spring; Typing; The Grand Finale; Shepherds and Sheep; Pre-Dawn Ride; Passport to Pimlico; No Parking; The Pacifist; Gallantry; Free Association; Lost and Found; Adam Pukes On Halloween; The L.A. Performance Scene (As Described by George DiCaprio); Rabbi's Vife
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Dance to Spring: Mars vendors are giving away free chocolate bars during one Spring day in New York.
Typing: Harvey gets Toby to type an article for which he'll be paid by the hour, but isn't pleased at the speed.
The Grand Finale: Harvey goes back on David Letterman's show and talks politics. After another testy exchange of words, Letterman tells him he's not going to be invited again.
Shepherds and Sheep: Harvey and Dave talk about the USA stockpiling weapons.
Pre-Dawn Ride: Harvey gets up early to drive to the airport.
Passport to Pimlico: A record collecting guy Harvey knows turns up for treatment in the hospital where he works. To make peace with Joyce, Harvey decides to get rid of his collection of 78s.
No Parking: The city re-zones the parking areas.
The Pacifist: A gun belt drops.
Gallantry: Overheard at a diner.
Free Association: A rant about the Oliver North case and then about Dean Martin from a man at a restaurant table.
Lost and Found: Harvey is called from work as his wife is locked out of the house. Later on he can't find the Italo Svevo novel he's been reading, but does find a wallet.
Adam Pukes On Halloween: George's son pukes in the car and George thinks he's got a result, but...
The L.A. Performance Scene (As Described by George DiCaprio): A unique stage act pulls a shocking stunt on the audience.
Rabbi's Vife: Harvey is told a joke.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-13 17:54:04. [CVDB174649] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:59:10. [Issue ID 543146]
